TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendContextMenu

summary.span: 使管理单元可以向现有快捷菜单添加项。

span.span: Enables a snap-in to add items to an existing shortcut menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通过 IExtendContextMenu 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 进行编程的详细信息，请参阅 [Mmc 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IExtendContextMenu interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddMenuItems (Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject piDataObject, Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IContextMenuCallback piCallback, ref int pInsertionAllowed);

Public Sub AddMenuItems (piDataObject As IDataObject, piCallback As IContextMenuCallback, ByRef pInsertionAllowed As Integer)
public: void AddMenuItems(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ piDataObject, Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IContextMenuCallback ^ piCallback, int % pInsertionAllowed);
abstract member AddMenuItems : Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject * Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IContextMenuCallback * int -> unit

param.name: piDataObject
param.span: 指向菜单数据对象上的 的指针，AddMenuItems 向该菜单的快捷菜单添加项。

span.span: A pointer to the on the data object of the menu to which the AddMenuItems is adding items to the shortcut menu.

param.name: piCallback
param.span: 一个指针，指向可以向快捷菜单添加项的 。

span.span: A pointer to an that can add items to the shortcut menu.

param.name: pInsertionAllowed
param.span: 可以使用的菜单项插入点，该插入点由 MMC 定义。

span.span: The MMC-defined menu-item insertion points that can be used.

summary.span: 使管理单元可以向现有快捷菜单添加项。

span.span: Enables a snap-in to add items to an existing shortcut menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通过 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (mmc) 进行编程的详细信息，请参阅 [Mmc 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Public Sub Command (lCommandID As Integer, piDataObject As IDataObject)
public: void Command(int lCommandID, Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ piDataObject);
abstract member Command : int * Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject -> unit

span.span: The command identifier of the menu item.

param.name: piDataObject
param.span: 一个指针，指向显示快捷菜单的对象上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object for which the shortcut menu was displayed.

summary.span: 如果添加的一个快捷菜单项被选定，Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 将调用 Command 方法。

span.span: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) calls the Command method when one of the shortcut menu items that you added is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通过 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (mmc) 进行编程的详细信息，请参阅 [Mmc 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
